item.description:
Update - here is the address for the restaurant after SkyZone:

 

Tahiti Restaurant and Cocktail Lounge
22 Mah Way
Providence Highway (Route 1)
Dedham, Massachusetts
Exit 15A off Route 128

 

I have been wanting to try this place for a while, so I'm finally making it happen. Think jumping on trampolines is just for kids? At Sky Zone, the adults get to have fun. We will meet up,  jump around for an hour ($12/hr) and then most likely head out for drinks. You can buy your ticket ahead of time to guarantee jump time..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://www.skyzone.com/boston.aspx

 

From the website:

Imagine a seemingly endless sea of trampolines, all connected to form one massive trampoline surface. Now, imagine that surface enclosed with angled trampolines that allow you to literally bounce off the walls! These patented, all-trampoline, walled playing courts are the foundation of Sky Zone Indoor Trampoline Park since we opened our first location in 2004. It's a playing court so original and unique, it was awarded a United States patent.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting in the lobby - meet at 7:45 for 8:00 reservation
item.name: Indoor Trampoline Jumping at Sky Zone Boston & post drinks/food at Tahiti
